
``get_img_corners``
=======================

get_img_corners

Description
-----------

finds four corner spatial coords of giottoImages or magick-images

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   get_img_corners(img_object)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``img_object``
     - giottoImage or magick-image to use
